definition: to decrease/to lose/to damage/to harm/(coll.) to speak sarcastically/to deride/caustic/mean/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷨)

sentences.english: Is it true that lack of iodine really causes brain damage?
sentences.chinese: 缺碘是否真的會造成腦損傷？

sentences.english: Patricia Neal raised money for children and adults who had suffered brain injuries.
sentences.chinese: 帕特里夏尼爾誰提出的兒童和成年人遭受腦損傷的錢。

sentences.english: RESULTS Ischemia enhanced cell proliferation in DG of adult rats.
sentences.chinese: 結果缺血性腦損傷可促進成年大鼠齒狀回的細胞增殖。

sentences.english: Brain injury may lead to neuronal cell necrosis.
sentences.chinese: 腦損傷可導致神經細胞壞死。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the electric physiologic changes in newborn piglets with HIBD.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察缺氧缺血性腦損傷新生豬腦電生理的變化。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate factors affecting prognosis of patients sustaining mild to moderate brain injury and discuss nursing strategies.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討影響輕中度腦損傷患者預後因素及護理對策。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the process of consciousness-regaining and outcome predictors in patients with head injury and coma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腦損傷昏迷病人有效促醒途徑和預測的指標。

sentences.english: But when consumed, they can cause cancer and brain damage.
sentences.chinese: 但是這些金屬會導致癌症及腦損傷。

sentences.english: Brain damage can produce weird shifts in behaviour and experience.
sentences.chinese: 腦損傷可以產生在行爲上和感受上很奇怪的變化。

sentences.english: Distortion of balance is often a consequence of traumatic brain injury.
sentences.chinese: 平衡失真往往是創傷性腦損傷帶來的結果。

sentences.english: The syndrome is often misdiagnosed as coma and severe brain damage.
sentences.chinese: 這種症狀經常被誤診爲昏迷和嚴重腦損傷。

sentences.english: Scientists have been researching on / into the causes of brain damage.
sentences.chinese: 科學家們一直對腦損傷的起因進行研究。

sentences.english: In 1962 Rick was born with brain damage.
sentences.chinese: 一九六二年，瑞克出生時就有腦損傷。

sentences.english: These findings bring hope for self-repair after brain injury.
sentences.chinese: 這些研究爲腦損傷後的自身修復帶來了希望。

sentences.english: DDMS can result from cerebral injury in utero or early in life.
sentences.chinese: DDMS可能是源於宮內或剛出生時的腦損傷。

sentences.english: Dan: Oh, I think I have brain damage .
sentences.chinese: 哦，我想我撞出腦損傷了。
